definition: Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

sentences.english: Use earplugs to eliminate noise, an eyeshade to kill the light, and turn the air-conditioning valve on high.
sentences.chinese: 用耳塞降低噪音，用眼罩来遮光，把空调风调大点。

sentences.english: He jacked in the earphone so that he would not disturb others.
sentences.chinese: 为了不打扰别人，他插上了耳塞。

sentences.english: For tinnitus, protection like ear plugs or ear defenders help.
sentences.chinese: 戴上耳塞或者护耳器等保护措施可以防止耳鸣。

sentences.english: Take out the iriver player. Wear the earphones. Walk quickly with the melody.
sentences.chinese: 拿出小艾，挂上耳塞，步速加急时依旧不忘跟着旋律。

sentences.english: All you have to do is put them on an hanger in your closet with the earbuds facing downwards.
sentences.chinese: 你所需做的是将之耳塞朝下挂在衣柜里。

sentences.english: If noise bothers you, wear earplugs or get a "white noise" machine.
sentences.chinese: 如果有噪音干扰，带个耳塞或者买个“白噪音”机器。

sentences.english: OK, I'll try to be more patient or buy some earplugs.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我尽量多忍忍，或者去买副耳塞。

sentences.english: Some in-the-ear earphones are capable of providing higher sound levels than some over-the-ear earphones.
sentences.chinese: 一些内置的耳塞能提供比外挂耳塞更高的音量。

sentences.english: Some in-the-ear earphones are capable of providing higher sound levels than some over-the-ear earphones.
sentences.chinese: 一些内置的耳塞能提供比外挂耳塞更高的音量。

sentences.english: Put on ear p! ugs when you are working in a noisy environment.
sentences.chinese: 在嘈杂环境中工作时戴上耳塞。

sentences.english: The only thing that would do a better job of keeping these earbuds in place would be Super Glue.
sentences.chinese: 唯一能使耳塞好好的保持原位的恐怕就是强力胶了。

sentences.english: A type of nonlinear earplug and its working principle and structure design are introduced in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 文章阐明了一种非线性耳塞的结构设计与工作原理。

sentences.english: Jonathan put in earplugs rather than getting angry about the noise.
sentences.chinese: 强纳生戴上耳塞，而不对噪音发脾气。

sentences.english: Bring ear plugs if you are a light sleeper or sensitive to snoring.
sentences.chinese: 如果你浅睡易醒或是对鼾声敏感，请自备耳塞。

sentences.english: I'm sorry, I wear ear plugs, did not catch your questioning.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，刚才我戴着耳塞，没听清您的问话。
安迪转过身把耳塞拔掉。

definition: loudspeaker box/speaker (audio equipment)/resonating chamber of a musical instrument/sound box
sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
